name: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly Quiz | Movies | 20 Questions
tags: Good, the Bad, and the Ugly, The

questions.text: Who is 'The Good'?
questions.explanation: Blondie.

questions.text: Who is 'The Bad'?
questions.explanation:
Angel Eyes.

	A very evil character indeed.

questions.text: Who is 'The Ugly'?
questions.explanation:
Tuco.

	He is a wanted criminal. The Good will turn him in for a reward, then rescue him just before he is hanged. Then they do it again.

questions.text: Who directed this movie?
questions.explanation: Sergio Leone.

questions.text: Who played 'The Good'?
questions.explanation:
Clint Eastwood & Eastwood.

	Blondie.

questions.text: What is Tuco's full name?
questions.correct: Tuco Benedito Pacifico Juan Maria Ramirez
options: Tuco Benedito Pacifico Juan Maria Gomez Garcia Miguel Ramirez
questions.explanation:
Tuco Benedito Pacifico Juan Maria Ramirez.

	'Or whatever other aliases you might have...'

questions.text: What actor plays Tuco?
questions.explanation:
Eli Wallach.

	Van Cleef plays Angel Eyes, Pistilli plays Tuco's brother, and Petito plays a storekeeper whom Tuco robbed.

questions.text: What was written on the grave containing the gold?
questions.explanation:
'Unknown'.

	'Unk... Unk... There is no name!'

questions.text: What is written on the grave beside that one?
questions.explanation:
'Arch Stanton'.

	Blondie told Tuco that the grave marked 'Arch Stanton' contained the money. He lied.

questions.text: During what war does this film take place?
questions.explanation: Civil War.

questions.text: What is the name of the army officer who is dying of gangrene?
questions.explanation:
They don't say.

	He was a Union officer.

questions.text: Who blows up the bridge?
questions.explanation:
Blondie and Tuco.

	They used explosives which they had handily been shielding behind.

questions.text: Bill Carson is missing a body part, making him a one-_______-man.
questions.explanation:
Eyed.

	Tuco stole his eyepatch to disguise himself. He called himself 'Bill Carson.'

questions.text: In the scene at the graveyard, whose eyes are shown close-up?
questions.explanation:
All of them.

	The graveyard scene is my favorite scene.

questions.text: 'The Bad' is a sergeant in the Union Army.
questions.explanation: True.

questions.text: What color is Blondie's hair?
questions.explanation: light brown.

questions.text: Tuco's brother is a doctor.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He is a priest.

questions.text: Who says the line 'I've never seen so many men wasted so bad'?
questions.explanation:
Blondie.

	Watching a battle.

questions.text: How much money is hidden in the grave?
How far is Blondie's walk across the desert?
questions.explanation:
100 miles.

	Tuco's walk back to town is 70 miles.
